title: S5E8 - Circe
description:
Oh Muses! In this episode, we tell the tale of Circe. We encounter bad decisions, using potions to solve your problems, unrequited love, a sea change, and personal growth. 
---
Grab a parent and tell us what you want to hear more of in the reviews! More mythology from other places? More adventure stories? More stories with snakes in them? What other podcasts would you like to hear from Nat Geo Kids?
We read all the reviews so let us know! Season 6 will be coming to your ears April 2022.
